W17_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to find your heart in Brighthome. The time has come to look somewhere else.

W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You stepped through the door to find yourself in a world filled with conflict. Can you really find your heart in a world like this?

W17_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: You should start by visiting the citadel.
